_comment: ðŸ¤– Claude/Cursor MCP Configuration for Agent Cellphone V2 Swarm Coordination
_instructions: Copy this file to your Claude/Cursor MCP configuration. Enables AI-Agent coordination through standardized MCP protocol.
_features: Send messages to individual agents (Agent-1, Agent-2, etc.)
Coordinate multi-agent tasks with role assignments
Access to 310+ MCP-integrated tools across 38 servers
Real-time agent coordination and task management
_usage_examples: Send task to Agent-7: 'Please implement the new feature'
Check swarm status: 'What's the current status of all agents?'
Coordinate project: 'Let's build a new website with Agent-7 and Agent-2'

agent-messaging.description: Agent-to-agent messaging with coordinate management - allows setting coords and inter-agent communication
